Getting Social with Bufco

12 Apr 2011

I bumped into Arlene Hazzan Green, co-owner of Bufco At Canada Blooms. Â Arlene, whom I initially met through Twitter, was so excited about all of the traffic coming to the Bufco website through social media that she couldn’t stop talking about it–even as she ran back to her booth to demonstrate her amazing raised beds for urban backyard gardeners.

Arlene reads books about seeds and soil, not books by Chris Brogan and Clay Shirkey, but she has a natural understanding and affinity for how social media works. Maybe it’s because she understands how to ensure ecosystems thrive or maybe it’s because she’s a natural storyteller–she started out in film and television.

Whatever the reason, Arlene gets it. Check out her blog and hear what she has to say in her own words.
